summary.description:
Today, a bit warmer for the feels like temperature (up 2.8°C) and outside temperature (up 2.1°C).

The past week and month had observable variation in the amount of wind (up 20 miles), dew point temperature (up 3.2°C), outside temperature (up 2.5°C), and inside temperature (up 2.5°C) when compared to today.

summary.summary: Inside; anticipate mild and comfortable temperatures. Outside; the temperature will feel pleasantly warm. Also, neither too dry nor too humid and gentle light winds are expected. Drizzle or light rain possible, cloud cover will be variable, overcast at times, and bright intervals likely. Weather patterns to stay the same.
